comments.html:
Glad to hear journaling is going well! My entries aren't every day, but I do like doing it most days.

I like your point of view and I've just realised that journaling serves so many purposes! I think I should start journaling like you. Thank you

Great post! Are you using the daily pages in your Hobonichi Cousin for this daily journaling? I just started using the dailies for this exact purpose and it's been great. I hope I can stick to it like you have :)
